container-title: He lives in Nottingham, UK. For Sarah, Mum and Dad. Thanks for believing in me, supporting me, and always putting up with my over-enthusiastic nonsense... A BLACK LIBRARY PUBLICATION First published in Great Britain in 2017
title: Andy Clark has written the Warhammer 40,000 short story ‘Whiteout’, the Age of Sigmar short story ‘Gorechosen’, and the Warhammer Quest Silver Tower novella Labyrinth of the Lost. Andy works as a background writer for Games Workshop, crafting the worlds of Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000

container-title: published in 2017 by Black Library, Games Workshop Ltd, Willow Road, Nottingham, NG7 2WS, UK. Produced by Games Workshop in Nottingham. Cover illustration by David Alvarez
